p: BCA: Bicinchoninic acid; DEP, differentially expressed protein; DMSO: dimethylsulfoxide; EGF: Extracellular growth factor; gFAELO, fatty acid elongase 1; gLCFACL, long chain fatty acid CoA ligase; GO, gene ontology; gPI4P5K, phosphatidylinositol-4-phosphate 5-kinase; gPLTATPase IIB, phospholipid-transporting ATPase IIB; gPSS, phosphatidylserine synthase; GSEA, gene set enrichment analysis; HAT, histone acetyltransferase; HCMP, high cysteine membrane protein; HDAC, histone deacetylase; IEC, intestinal epithelial cell; KAc, acetylated lysine; KAT, lysine acetyltransferase; KDa, kilodalton; KDAC, lysine deacetylase; K-MMe, mono-methylated lysine; Mtz, metronidazole; NAD: Nicotinamide adenine dinucleotide; NADPH: Nicotinamide dinucleotide phosphate; nanoLC-MS/MS, nanoflow liquid chromatography tandem mass spectrometry; NR, nitroreductase; PCA, principal component analysis; PFOR, pyruvate ferrodoxin oxidoreductase; PITPÎ±, PI transfer protein alpha isoform; PP2A, protein phosphatase type 2A; pY, phosphorylated tyrosine; SDS: sodium dodecyl sulfate; SPE, solid phase extraction; STRING: Search Tool for the Retrieval of Interacting Genes; TMT, tandem mass tags; TSA, trichostatin A; VSP, variant-specific surface protein.
